about.title: About Us
about.name: Christ Vision Sanctuary International
about.description: Christ Vision Sanctuary International is a powerful, open and dynamic International Evangelism Center established and led by Bishop Louis Macaiah.
about.mission: For over 20 years, we have been proclaiming the Word of God with power and authority. Our mission is to preserve Christ's vision and position believers to fulfill their divine destiny.
about.quote: Preserved for a purpose, positioned for a new thing!

healing.title: Healing
healing.desc: Men and women healed from all diseases and infirmities by the power of the Name of Jesus.

deliverance.title: Deliverance
deliverance.desc: People delivered from all oppressions and demonic possessions, from all satanic bonds.

restoration.title: Restoration
restoration.desc: Lives restored, families reconciled, homes rebuilt by the love of God.

evangelism.title: Evangelism
evangelism.desc: Men and women freed from the bondage of the world and coming to the Lord.

calendar.title: The Calendar
calendar.subtitle: Don't miss anything!
calendar.description: Discover our calendar for the year: a year of faith, sharing and fraternity awaits you! Between spiritual highlights, fraternal encounters and solidarity actions, let's move forward together on the path of hope.

program.specialEventsDesc: Check our calendar to discover conferences, seminars and special events taking place in the coming weeks.
